response.overview: The "Words on the Page" of Flags of Our Fathers by James Bradley describe the reality of the Battle of Iwo Jima and the unintended consequences of the famous flag-raising photo, focusing on the soldiers' experiences of fighting for their buddies rather than for heroic glory. The book explores the disconnect between the public's perception of the "heroes" and the grim, harrowing reality of war, highlighting the sacrifices and suffering endured by the men on the ground
response.title: Words on the Page
